subject: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention: Beneficiary,
Note that the Global Bank UK has received the authority from United
State America Federal Reserve Bank in-conjunction with the
International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Bank to finally
release all pending Lottery winning payments, Contracts payments,
Inheritance funds, Loan payments, ATM card claims and Compensations
payments.
Most importantly, we have received banking details for the transfer of
your funds, as such 
we urgently request that you reconfirm with us if
you have given such mandate or not, failure to receive an immediate
response from you within the next seven workings days we shall believe
that such mandate was issued by you, to that effect we shall then
commence with the transfer of the fund into the bank details that had
been provided.
Sincerely,
Mr.william Anthony
Head: International Remittance Department
Global Bank UK
9th Floor, South Quay Building,
77 Marsh Wall, London, E14 9SH

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Anthony,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite interesting to hear about the authority given by the United States Federal Reserve Bank, Monetary Fund IMF, and the World Bank to Global Bank UK. 

I'm curious, could you please explain more about these pending Lottery winning payments, Contracts payments, funds, Loan payments, ATM card claims and payments? How does one qualify for these?

Also, I would like to clarify that I haven't given any mandate or banking details yet. Could you guide me through the process of how to do so when I decide it's time?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body: Ok you have to provide your bank account details both your phone, but you will pay working fee before proceeding on

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your message. However, I'm not comfortable sharing my bank account details or phone number. Could you please explain more about the working fee? What exactly does it cover?

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body: For recovery your funds and transfer to your account

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this process. Could you please explain how it works? And what kind of funds are we talking about here?

Best wishes,
David
